locales.description: Post label. Posts labeled "Misgendering & Deadnaming" demonstrate a lack of respect for a trans person's identity in the vein of misgendering, degendering, and deadnaming. This includes intentional and unintentional behavior. Repetitious or severe acts of disrespect likely entail other labels.
locales.name: Misgendering & Deadnaming

locales.description: Post/account label. Posts labeled "Transphobia (General)" demonstrate a generally transphobic stance. This includes intentional and unintentional behavior. Repetitious or severe general transphobia likely entails an account label.
locales.name: Transphobia (General)

locales.description: Post/account label. Posts labeled "Transmisogyny" demonstrate a transmisogynistic stance. This includes intentional and unintentional behavior. Repetitious or severe transmisogyny likely entails an account label.
locales.name: Transmisogyny

locales.description: Post/account label. Posts labeled "Enbyphobia" demonstrate an enbyphobic stance, which includes transmedicalism. This includes intentional and unintentional behavior. Repetitious or severe enbyphobia likely entails an account label.
locales.name: Enbyphobia
